column4: i installed the nvidia beta driver and now X doesnt work. It says it cant load libglx. What to do?
run the installer with the --uninstall switch
ok now reinstall the ubuntu nvidia drivers
were you using nvidia-glx or nvidia-glx-new?
then: sudo apt-get --purge remove nvidia-glx linux-restricted-modules-$(uname -r)
followed by: sudo apt-get install nvidia-glx linux-generic
k doing it now. its downloading some pkgs
once this is done you think i should reboot? or just restart gdm
